    • Uses of ALRState in swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ALRGenerator<I extends Item,S extends ALRState<I>>
      Base class for LR(0) and LR(1) parser generators.

    • Uses of ALRState in swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.states

      Subclasses of ALRState in swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.states 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LR0State
      Implements LR0State.goTo(Symbol) and LR0State.closure(GrammarInfo) from ALRState for LR0 grammar generation.
      class  LR1State
      This class represents a generator state for a LR(1) grammar, and thus consists of a set of LR(1) items.
      Methods in swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.parser.generator.states that return ALRState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract ALRState<I> ALRState.closure(GrammarInfo grammarInfo)
      Returns the closure of this LR0State as another LR0State.
      abstract ALRState<I> ALRState.goTo(Symbol symbol)
      Moves the position if the items one step further when the given symbol follows and returns them as a new state (only the kernel, without closure).
